DRIVING ON STATE HIGHWAY AT 55 MPH. VEHICLE SHUDDERED, THEN LOST POWER THOUGH ENGINE WAS STILL RUNNING. NO RESPONSE WHEN ACCELERATOR PRESSED. "WRENCH" WARNING LIGHT ON. PULLED OFF THE ROAD, TURNED ENGINE OFF. RESTARTED ENGINE. WARNING LIGHT OFF. IT HAPPEN

TRAVELING AT FREEWAY SPEED, ENGINE SUDDENLY LOST ALL POWER AND REVERTED TO IDLE RPM. ENGINE WAS IDLING ROUGHLY, AND PRESSING ON ACCELERATOR WOULD NOT INCREASE RPMS. THE "WRENCH" (CHECK ENGINE) LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED. WAS ABLE TO COAST DOWNHILL TO EXIT FREE

I WAS DRIVING MY CAR AND SUDDENLY THE ENGINE JUST SHUT DOWN IN THE MIDDLE OF THE TRAFFIC.  THIS HAS HAPPENED CONSTANTLY IN THE LAST COUPLE OF DAYS.  FOR A TEMPORARY FIX WE WOULD NEED TO TURN THE ENGINE OFF AND THEN ON SO THE ISSUE TEMPORARY ?DISAPPEARS?

I WAS DOING 55 MPH AND MY CAR STALLED, THE WRENCH AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON THEN THE CAR STOPPED. AFTER A COUPLE ATTEMPTS THE CAR STARTED AND I WAS ALLOWED TO DRIVE ALTHOUGH I WAS SCARED AND GOT OFF THE FREEWAY. I ALSO HAVE HAD A PROBLEM WITH MY WHEE

POWER STEERING FAILURE. DRIVING AT 35MPH WHEN SERVICE POWER STEERING NOW WARNING CAME ON. TURNED THE CAR OFF, WHEN TURNED BACK ON, CAR HAD NO POWER STEERING. TOOK CAR TO DEALER AND WAS TOLD THAT IT NEEDED A NEW POWER STEERING RACK AND REPAIRS TO COST 1500

WHILE DRIVING AT ABOUT 45 MPH THE CAR CHIMED AND POSTED A WARNING ON THE DISPLAY. IT TOLD ME TO CHECK THE POWER STEERING. THE POWER STEERING WAS STILL WORKING SO I CONTINUED DRIVING. ONCE I CAME UPON A STOP LIGHT I TURNED THE VEHICLE OFF TO TRY AND CLEAR

MY CAR LOST COMPLETE POWER WILE TRAVERSING AN INTERSECTION.  I WAS ALMOST HIT BY A LARGE TRUCK AS I HAD NO POWER IN MY CAR.  TOOL IT TO THE DEALER AND IT IS A DEFECTIVE THROTTLE BODY THAT FORD IS AWARE OF.  MECHANIC SAID HE SEES THIS HAPPEN ALL THE TIME.
